H0.text: Which town’s Crab Fair features a world-famous face-pulling or “gurning” contest. Workington

H1.text: Which town’s Crab Fair features a world-famous face-pulling or “gurning” contest. Whitehaven

H2.text: Which town’s Crab Fair features a world-famous face-pulling or “gurning” contest. Keswick

H3.text: Which town’s Crab Fair features a world-famous face-pulling or “gurning” contest. Egremont

A4.text: the fair continues as the Crab Fair, which now hosts the World Gurning Championships.
